---

title: "Add Mod Dependencies"
description: "Add mod dependencies required by the corresponding mod. A dependency is a mod that should be installed for this mod to run. Successful request will return [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Mod Dependencies"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/dependencies"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add mod dependencies required by the corresponding mod. A dependency is a mod that should be installed for this mod to run. Successful request will return [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object).



:::tip

[Rules engine](/moderation/rules-engine) applies here.

:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Add Mod Dependencies Request","properties":{"dependencies":{"description":"The dependencies to add to the mod. When `sync` is true and this attribute is ommitted, all dependencies will be removed.","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"},"example":"284"},"sync":{"description":"If true, will remove all existing dependencies and replace with the new ones provided in the request (if any).","type":"boolean","example":"false"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","headers":{"Location":{"description":"URL to newly created resource","schema":{"type":"string"}}},"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Add Mod Dependencies Response","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":201},"message":{"type":"string","example":"You have successfully updated the dependencies for the specified mod."}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to add dependencies for this mod, this action is restricted to team managers & administrators only.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15031":"The authenticated user does not have permission to add dependencies for this mod, this action is restricted to team managers & administrators only."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
